channel.title: AoE2:The conquers
channel.description:
Just went through hell to get this set upon my new PC and network. Ended up completely changing the OS, installing tons of different crap, reseting my router, changing all the computer settings from the machine downstairs, and editing tons of connection rules. Until finally, a few hours ago, England has prevailed over the machine and it works *cue anthem*
Anyhow, I would like to suggest a tournament. Now this has been done before, and it was very fun, so allow me to provide some information about it:
Depending on how many people we have, we may have to do multiple games, but we'll cross that bridge when it comes to it. You don't have to pay for the game, you can obtain it through means which don't involve paying money, which I cannot link to for various rule reasons. Join #aoe
I'll give you more information on the IRC. You'll need game ranger etc etc
EDIT - We'll probably end up doing different AoEs, you'll also need:
AoEO which is on steam right now.

item.title: AoE2:The conquers
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

I can attend between 6PM and 2 AM GMT, any day works for me.

Read full topic

item.title: AoE2:The conquers
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Sorry, had no internet connection. Hopefully I can still get this going…

Speljohan:

How about AoEO, given that it’s free and the pvp now is gear and level-free (even playfield). It’s on steam now as well so.

Any AoE is fine.

Next step is when do we want to do it? I’m up for pretty much anytime within the next 2 weeks, I’ll go ahead and propose tomorrow at 8PM GMT?

Read full topic
